TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlLink extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl

summary.span: 允许对服务器上的 HTML 元素进行编程访问。

span.span: Allows programmatic access to the HTML element on the server.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建并初始化控件的新实例。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式声明控件并定义其属性。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically declare an control and define its properties. 有关完整的工作代码示例, 请参阅类概述主题。For a complete, working code example, see the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink/CS/htmllink.cs#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink/CS/htmllinkcs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink/VB/htmllinkvb.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink/VB/htmllink.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置在 控件中指定的链接的 URL 目标。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL target of the link specified in the control.
The URL target of the link.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定在控件中指定的链接的 URL 目标。The property specifies the URL target of the link specified in the control. 您可以使用此属性来指定外部级联样式表 (CSS) 的位置。You can use this property to specify the location of an external cascading style sheet (CSS). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性设置为与网页保存在同一目录中的级联样式表 (CSS)。The following code example demonstrates setting the property to a cascading style sheet (CSS) that is saved in the same directory as the Web page. 有关完整的工作代码示例, 请参阅类概述主题。For a complete, working code example, see the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink/CS/htmllink.cs#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink/CS/htmllinkcs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink/VB/htmllinkvb.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink/VB/htmllink.vb#2)]

span.span: The that receives the rendered content.

summary.span: 将 控件呈现给指定的 对象。

span.span: Renders the control to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 ASP.NET 应用程序配置为呈现 XHTML 兼容标记, 则方法将呈现右大括号 (/>)。The method renders a closing bracket (/>) if the ASP.NET application is configured to render XHTML-compliant markup. 默认情况下, ASP.NET 页和控件呈现与 XHTML 1.1 标准兼容的标记。By default, ASP.NET pages and controls render markup that is compatible with the XHTML 1.1 standard. 有关为非 XHTML 呈现配置 ASP.NET 网站的详细信息, 请参阅[笔尖:如何：在 ASP.NET 网站](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42483a54-f1ae-44e1-88e6-4370f8690149)中配置 XHTML 呈现。For more information on configuring an ASP.NET Web site for non-XHTML rendering, see [NIB: How to: Configure XHTML Rendering in ASP.NET Web Sites](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42483a54-f1ae-44e1-88e6-4370f8690149).

span.span: The that receives the rendered content.

summary.span: 将 控件的属性呈现到指定的 对象。

span.span: Renders the control's attributes to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法解析属性, 然后调用基类的方法。 The method resolves the property before calling the base class's method.
